introduction: Buttons allow users to perform actions in a practical way.

classes.name: ui-button-container
classes.function: Used to enclose a set of buttons.

classes.name: cover
classes.function: Align the buttons to the right, already spaced for the card.

classes.name: align-right
classes.function: Align the buttons to the right without spacing for the card.

classes.name: align-left
classes.function: Align the buttons to the left.

classes.name: primary
classes.function: Adds the primary system theme to the button.

classes.name: accent
classes.function: Adds the secondary system theme to the button.

classes.name: warning
classes.function: Adds an alert look to the button.

classes.name: error
classes.function: Adds an error look to the button.

classes.name: flat
classes.function: Removes the background color from the button, leaving only the highlighted text.

classes.name: raised
classes.function: Adds a slight shadow around the button.

classes.name: full
classes.function: Makes the button occupy 100% of the container.

classes.name: icon
classes.function: The button takes on a small circular shape. Must be used in conjunction with an icon.
